title: Courgette stew
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 small onion, thinly sliced', '1 courgette, diced', '2 tomatoes, skin removed and diced', '1/2 green pepper, seeded and diced (optional)', '1 to 2 garlic cloves, chopped', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese, grated', 'fresh parsley, chopped']
